mapper.select: SELECT r.RESIDX, r.RESNAME, r.RESRUN, r.RESNUM, r.TYPEIDX, r.RESCLEANSCORE, r.ADDRGU, r.ADDRDONG, r.OLDADDR, r.NEWADDR, r.NUMADDR, r.XPOS, r.YPOS, COUNT(p.PENALTYIDX) AS PENALTYCOUNT FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN PENALTY p ON r.RESIDX = p.RESIDX WHERE r.RESRUN = 1 GROUP BY r.RESIDX ORDER BY PENALTYCOUNT DESC;

SELECT r.RESIDX, r.RESNAME, r.RESRUN, r.RESNUM, r.TYPEIDX, r.RESCLEANSCORE, r.ADDRGU, r.ADDRDONG, r.OLDADDR, r.NEWADDR, r.NUMADDR, r.XPOS, r.YPOS, COUNT(p.PENALTYIDX) AS PENALTYCOUNT FROM RESTAURANT r INNER JOIN PENALTY p ON r.RESIDX = p.RESIDX WHERE r.RESIDX = #{RESIDX} GROUP BY r.RESIDX
